packages.name: synology-monitor
packages.description: EasySystems GmbH Kuma Monitor Addon for Synology DSM with SMART, storage, backup, ping, port, DNS checks, guided elevated-access setup, diagnostics views, per-monitor actions, multi-instance peering with mTLS security, and Uptime Kuma push integration.
packages.desc: EasySystems GmbH Kuma Monitor Addon for Synology DSM with SMART, storage, backup, ping, port, DNS checks, guided elevated-access setup, diagnostics views, per-monitor actions, multi-instance peering with mTLS security, and Uptime Kuma push integration.
